website_summaries.verdict: The starry sky design and subtle heat make this a safe and quality choice for kids and adults alike.
pros: The goggle-like shape of this mask effectively blocks out all light
The mask gets warm but never too hot, making it safe for kids to use
The warmth effectively relieves pain from tension and sinus headaches
The mask is comfortable to wear for long periods of time
The night sky pattern is fun and aesthetically pleasing
cons: USB power cord is a little on the short side

customer_reviews.title: Actually WORKS & Super Comfortable Totally blacks out any light
customer_reviews.text: I've been suffering from Excessive Dry Eyes. I've been on so many eye drops, sleeping goggles and still wake-up with scratchy, sand paper, burning, light sensitivity eyes. But my first nite with this heated eye mask made a great difference for me. I feel with more time I will NEVER try any other eye mask. My only complaint is the short cord. The Power Bank would solve that problem since I could put it under my pillow and not worry about turning in bed. Highly recommend this for anyone BUT especially for dry eye people.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S. Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: Satisified
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of my extremely dry eye and warm compresses would be to warm, not warm enough and cool to fast. I have had this and used 2x a day for 2 weeks now for 15 to 20 min. when I go to bed and upon waking. I no longer have blurred vision. Of course there is no cure for dry eye, my eyes feel so much better. Yes would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AMY S VILLA

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and heat eye mask!
customer_reviews.text: I have night time dry eyes caused by blepharitis. I have been using Thalon compresses that are heated in the microwave and though I like them I find that they cool down faster then I like. This mask is great as you can adjust the heat to one of three levels and the just relax for 20 to 40 minutes. The mask keeps the temperature I like and the mask sits comfortably on my face. The first time I used it I almost fell asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Tory

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS MASK! I noticed it was a size large, and I first I was hesitant (I have a smaller head). Very easy to operate, and comfy to wear. This is a must for all who need quick relief from dry eyes. I just had a LASIK touch-up, and this time around left my right eye very dry. Pair this with the Sistine nighttime protection gel, and you will feel on top of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for dry eyes and sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry eyes. I have tried the microwave masks but they give little relief, don't hold the warmth and are not convenient. This mask is great. It serves to purposes for me. It helps with my dry eye condition. More so than any other mask I have tried. For the first time I feel like this condition is improving instead of declining. Second but also related to dry eyes, I can now use the ceiling fan again. This mask blocks all light and makes a great sleep mask. The warmth stays on at your chosen temperature for 45 to 60 minutes. It's easy to restart if and when you want more.
customer_reviews.author: Froggy

customer_reviews.title: Dry Eyes Relieved Without Meds!
customer_reviews.text: I have dry eye and my cornea specialist told me to buy one from him that you heat in microwave. I thought an electric one would be better. When I found this, I thought WOW, maybe I will look younger too! I haven’t used it long enough for that, but, I wear it when I lay down at night and after 15, 20 minutes, I can feel the oil glands release. My eyes feel much better. When this finally wears out, I willl definitely buy a new one. No bad side effects like meds can have!
customer_reviews.author: karen cook

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes
customer_reviews.text: So soothing and gets pretty warm almost hot. I have puffy eye problems and headaches, insomnia and this definitely helps.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: seems an innovative product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has dry eye problems. After reading reviews of this product at Amazon, I decided to give it a try. This product is very well designed. It came with a nice package. The materials and craftsmanship are high quality. It is surprisingly lightweight and is comfortable to use. My y daughter is starting with light usages (15-20 minutes a time, 2-3 times a day) so that we can be familiar with and get comfortable with this product. It functions as what is described. It helps my daughter to relax her eyes after her study. She likes it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this eye mask to treat my chronic blepharitis . I have one that you heat in the microwave but its not good for travel. This one has a pouch that it fits in and it packs without taking up much space. It gets plenty hot. I keep mine on low and that is perfect. I took mine on a cruise and the night stand had a usb port right next to the bed. Perfect for relaxing before sleep. You can take a mini power bank just in case. Fits well and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: lghmc

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews and was slightly skeptical but this eye mask is great. I have dry eyes and I wear contact lenses, which the doctor threatened to take away. I purchased a rice pack heating pad but wanted to heat my eyes longer. This works GREAT! Because there is padding inside that encircles the eye area. The heat gets pleasingly warm and it really helps my eyes. I use it first thing in the morning to start my day and I use it again in the evening. If you need warmth form your eyes this product is awesome, I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lamcham

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I have MGD and my doctor recommended heat therapy for my eyes. I bought this unit based on its localized heating area and 3 heat settings. The unit fits well and it completely adjustable. It is wonderful. It does not come with a power pack but can be plugged into anything with a USB port. A power pack IS available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing eye mask
customer_reviews.text: This eye mask feel great and really blocks out the light. Its too early to tell if it will help with the dark circles. If it does, I'll post another review. I also wrote this review in response to an offer to receive a free mini power bank which is helpful considering the cord on this mask is quite short.
customer_reviews.author: monlove

customer_reviews.title: Better than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love this heated eye mask. They are of a higher quality than what I expected. The heat is perfect. I just thought it will be awesome if it come with a power bank, because the cord is a little too short to be charge on a outlet next to my bed. But I ended up connecting it to my laptop. That will work. It come in a very nice box too; it will make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: tiktan2000

customer_reviews.title: I think this mask help your eyes to take a ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this mask help your eyes to take a rest from long day of work after staring at the computer all day. I would say it is not hard to use. Back of the massager is adjustable and you can control temperature with a little remote that they give you. It comes with little usb cord that connect with power, mask, instruction.
customer_reviews.author: Alice K

customer_reviews.title: I like this!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this I honestly thought it was a bit of a joke. It came in great packaging, with instructions, but the mask it's self was just not what I was expecting... not that I had anything in mind... but it actually works. When I have used it on tired strained eyes, it actually alleviates and soothes it... so I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: CrucialA

customer_reviews.title: Comforting & soothing mask /  Great for tired eyes after hours of tablet and phone use!
customer_reviews.text: I find this mask very comforting. My eyes start to get dry and blurry after using my tablet and phone, this infrared therapy is just the thing. I keep my room quite cool at night so this really feels really relaxing and the sensation helps quiet my mind. I like that it has padded eye cups. It’s thick and made well so I’m sure I’ll get a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow Gardens

customer_reviews.title: Eyes heaven
customer_reviews.text: This mask helps soothing dry and tired eyes. I had pterygium (surfer's eyes) surgery that often leaves me with very dried eyes. I used this pad before sleeping, it really helped to keep my eyes moisturized. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tsiu11

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I read one review that said it was almost dangerously hot. I WISH I had that one. I had this on the highest setting and, after 15-20 minutes, I could tell it was...slightly...(maybe) warm. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Ordered two. Both broke.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product twice,and both times it broke shortly after receiving it. The first mask overheated within several weeks of purchase, so fortunately I was able to return it. I thought it may have been a fluke, so I ordered another. Within two months it suddenly stopped turning on. This product is glitchy and unreliable. It is irresponsible of the manufacturer to continue with the same design. That being said, I appreciated the affect it had when it was working. However I absolutely don't recommend purchase. Find another mask.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Good eye mask, but temp could go higher.
customer_reviews.text: This works fine. I like that the cord is attached with a magnet so if I move it will come off easily and not get tangled. I just wish it heated up to a higher temp, although I think that is probably just my personal preference - others may find the highest heat setting fine. I use this when I have a migraine or sinus pressure and it helps a lot. The quality is good. I like that the eye pad area is a bit raised so that it doesn't interfere with REM eye movement.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Lukewarm pseudoscientific garbage
customer_reviews.text: This thing is hot garbage. It comes nowhere close to your eyelids, and in no way replicates a warm compress (as advertised). Even if it did, it barely gets warm on the "hot" setting when plugged into a high power USB port. I'm beyond disappointed. Despite the marketing in the description, the included manual makes it pretty clear that the original target market is people who want ✨magic✨ graphene powered IR wrinkle reduction, not people trying to warm their eyelids.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Vixie

customer_reviews.title: This eye mask is very comfortable and helpful
customer_reviews.text: This eye mask is very comfortable, and the quality of the materials used is also very good. The power cable interface is very special, with the function of magnet. The most important thing is that the middle of the eye mask is sunken, which does not compress the eyes. The heating function is very powerful. It can cut off the power automatically in 1 hour, which is very good and worth recommending.
customer_reviews.author: Ruijun

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really can’t say enough about this product. I bought it a few weeks ago and finally am using it today. I have chronic dry eye, to the point where my ophthalmologist will be performing a “punctal inclusion“ a couple weeks from now. I currently am on my second bout of conjunctivitis within two months. The consistent heat is so soothing and has helped me with the conjunctivitis that I’m going to routinely start using this multiple times a day! I also really like the usb function and that there are three heat settings am so thankful that something like this exists! I didn’t want to spend very much but it is worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after first use.  Wouldn't get hot.  Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this eye mask would be comfortable and easy to use. I have a big problem with dry eye and have been told by my eye doctor to hold a warm compress to my eyes 4 times a day to free up the oil glands. I tried the microwavable type and it's just so tedious and time consuming, plus you need a microwave nearby. There's three heat settings so you can adjust to your needs. I was looking forward to seeing positive results to alleviate my dry eye symptoms and keep my oil glands unplugged. Stopped working after the first use. Would not get hot anymore. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for anyone with a nose
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to rate this high, as it heats up well, and appears that it should be comfortable and do a good job with heating. However, if you have any bridge to your nose at all, it will sit so high that you cannot use it. The product says it puts no pressure on your nose. That may be true only if you have a tiny nose with no bridge at all. I returrned and received a replacement hoping for a mistake, but the replacement has the same very narrow, and shallow nose cutout. Unless there is a safe way to modify the cutout, I sadly will have to permanently return, and look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: shembop

customer_reviews.title: Heated eye mask
customer_reviews.text: So this is pretty cool I thought this maybe helpful for when me or my husband get a migraine or even just to relax it heats up around the eyes but it does not get really hot it's more like warmth it's very relaxing and it is dark it's a soft material it's a great way to relax
customer_reviews.author: melissa brown

customer_reviews.title: Use it every night!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the eye mask for a trip to New Orleans last month mostly because it seemed like it would do a great job of keeping light out; every other eye mask I’ve owned didn’t do a good job of keeping out light. Heated? Hey, I figured why not! I LOVE THIS THING! I’ve fallen asleep with it on almost every night for a month! Glad I splurged! I’ve already gotten my money’s worth! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped with sleeping issues
customer_reviews.text: I have been having issues sleeping recently. This has caused me to feel much fatigue in my every day life, and has affected my reationships and work performance. I needed a remedy, and this Heated Eye Mask worked great. When I put it on at first, it felt fairly uncomfortable. However, after the mask began to heat up, I found it very soothing. It even seemed to clear my sinuses. I was fast asleep not long after. My only complaint is that the wire for the mask is quite short. You have to be sleeping very close to an electrical outlet, or get a USB extension cord. Aside from that, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: rmpearl

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not convienent.
customer_reviews.text: This product works as it says it does. However, the cord is very short. It has to be plugged in or on a battery pack (not included). I haven’t used it much at all for that very reason
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Roell

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Defective product!
customer_reviews.text: After a few days the eye mask quit working. I don't know if mine was defective or if this brand is just poor quality. Also, this eye mask does not get hot enough to help with dry eye issues. Save your money and buy a different product. I missed the window to return it, so I'm stuck with a broken item and out the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Heated mask
customer_reviews.text: I like the level of heat the mask gives off. The space for my eyes seems to be too big because in order to have direct contact with the heat I have to press the mask go my face. Overall so far seems like a good purchase. It would be nice if they developed a wireless one of these that could be charged so I didn't have to keep it plugged in to a power pack.
customer_reviews.author: T Eva

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this mask a bit especially after a long day in front of the computer at work. It quickly calms his eyes and the redness diminishes. It is also a very relaxing spa-like treatment if you are looking for that at the end of a busy day but prefer to skip the spa.
customer_reviews.author: BGWoman

customer_reviews.title: Does not work/ no return extend
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY this it did not even get warm. I bought this as a gift to my mom for her dry eye she tried it out too late electronics always scare her and by the time she did it was too late to return. You’re better off to buy the heated bead ones you out in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Remels

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get too warm which is fine since I know far infrared heat works by penetrating ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night as I am going to sleep. Very relaxing and helps me fall asleep quicker by relaxing the facial muscles and blocking out all light (especially the light coming from tiny blue lights in the room). It doesn't get too warm which is fine since I know far infrared heat works by penetrating and heating up the tissues inside for deep relaxation..
customer_reviews.author: Lynn B

customer_reviews.title: Works well...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent comfort and relaxation from the infrared heat settings while wearing the eye mask. I have severe dry eyes and feel the infrared is helping. Though I would like thicker foam over the eye lids to assist in keeping the eyes closed while sleeping to prevent further dry eyes. I would also like to have a solid black eye mask, if they make a new version. But, it is best eye mask so far!
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Well crafted, good product
customer_reviews.text: This product is aesthetically pleasing, gets hot, and is well crafted. My only problem is that the neoprene around the eyes is thick so I have to press the mask to get the heat directly on the lid.
customer_reviews.author: LyzzA

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and just right temperature
customer_reviews.text: Have used other eye pads from heating in microwave and at times got too hot or not hot enough to use for dry eyes that takes over 10 minutes for good results. This heated eye mask has 3 temp. options and goes as long as you need. Another result from using a too hot pad caused my eyes to be very blurry after, but not with using this one. So versatile for travel or any place in home with hooking into my laptop. Great design and ease of use and eyes feel so much better. Laverne
customer_reviews.author: laverne tardiff

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept But Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the mask in the beginning, but after 4 to 5 weeks of nightly use the band separated while I was taking the mask off. I repaired it using fabric glue and once again was happy. However. approximately 4 to 5 weeks later the USB cord came apart when i removed it fom the battery pack. Glue could not fix it this time. I feel it's a great concept but is cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Will no be using it anymore
customer_reviews.text: Could be better for blocking out the light. The eye area is a tad bit small when I close my eyes and have this product just right I can still feel it with my eyes. Every now and then after waking up my eyelid flips because of this. If this was better designed I would give it 4 stars as the passing could be more Comfy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Githens

customer_reviews.title: Functions as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Functions as promised. Provides a effective warm heat (on the high setting). Easy to connect to power source, easy turn on/off and change heat level, fits comfortably (doesn't block or put pressure on the nose, easily wraps around my big head - size is easily adjustable). I used a thin cotton barrier (a piece of a thin dish towel) to keep the eye mask clean - the warmth still penetrated to my eyes without problem. Negative: there is a slight neoprene-esque odor that isn't the best (I am VERY sensitive to odors), but this not a deal breaker for me. I would recommend this eye mask.
customer_reviews.author: Kacrei

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The mask heats very well. I have dry eyes and the heat helps the oil glands on the bottom of my eyelids to secrete oil. The only thing I don’t like is that the cord needs to be longer. The mask is comfortable and I recommend using it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn D.

customer_reviews.title: Soothing Dry Eye Mask with Heat
customer_reviews.text: This mask was very well constructed. The Velcro strap is very tight even on a small head such as mine. The heat settings are so soothing on the eyes. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dori

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived incomplete. Returned for replacement. The replacement arrived. Incomplete. Both were missing the power pack. Without a powerpack they are useless. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Meets all stated capabilities
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from irritated, dry eyes which worsens throughout the day. Using the heated eye mask has given me a great deal of relief. Directions are simple and straight forward, mask completely blocks out any light, it is comfortable and light weight, and the cord used to heat the eye mask is not in a cumbersome position. I particularly the cushion surrounding the eye rather than making direct contact with the eye. Finally it has a really full design.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very short cord! Low heat!
customer_reviews.text: Cord is way too small in length. Tried it on the highest setting for 30 minutes on two separate times after first opening it and it produced very little heat. Nothing like the advertised 100 degrees or more. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry eye relief
customer_reviews.text: This is great for anyone who suffers from dry eye and clogged lipid ducts. I have chronic dry eyes and was told by my optometrist to use warm compresses 3-4 times a day to open my clogged lipids. She suggested I try a heated eye mask. This is so much more convenient and longer lasting than warm wash cloths or microwave masks I had been using. I can use it anywhere in the house or when traveling. I get relief after wearing it 10-15 mins. I'm buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: The USB Cord is Extremely Short
customer_reviews.text: USB CORD IS EXTREMELY SHORT, and because of this, using this mask is almost impossible. I would not recommend this heated eye mask because it’s very difficult to get the mask connected.
customer_reviews.author: Old Woman

customer_reviews.title: Good product as advertised
customer_reviews.text: We use it to relieve our eye pressure as we grow older. We now use it every night & it feels relaxing every time we put it on. Already recommended to a fiend who also wants to relief her eye pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Wu

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for your dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mask for several weeks, and am quite pleased with the results! I use it at least once a day, usually soon after I wake up. It has really enhanced my treatment for dry eye syndrome, as the heat lasts longer than with a microwaveable mask. I would love to have the portable power pack, which would make it much more convenient to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen P. Vance

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and Inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: The mask itself is not adjustable so the area around the eyes were too large. The strap was also too large so the mask was uncomfortably loose around my head. The material itself is hard on the skin. The line connected to the port was also too short and the buttons were too small making them inconvenient for use. Out of the several heated masks I’ve used, this is one of the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Temperature for the Eyes
customer_reviews.text: This item is exactly as described. For those who wrote that the mask doesn't get hot enough, it does. It's not good for the body to put extreme heat on the eyes; you don't want to scald your eyes, which are sensitive. On the highest setting, this mask does get very warm. The auto shutoff is a great feature. And, this item is at a great price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Works great for MGD and dry eyes!
customer_reviews.text: This is such an improvement on the microwaveable eye masks. It stays warm longer and sits more comfortably on the eyes. I haven't had a chance to travel with it yet, so that is why I didn't give it a full five stars. I do wish it came with a portable power bank because the cord is rather short. Overall I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NotMe

customer_reviews.title: Provided essentially no heat; extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received this and was excited to try it as an alternative to warm compresses for dry eye. No matter how long I allowed it to warm up, I was barely able to detect any heat. I bought the product primarily for the heat aspect, and was disappointed by the inability to feel any heat. I would not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: oregonian

customer_reviews.title: Nice But Wish Could Form Shape
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It does relieve and relax my eyes for dry eyes. I have a smaller face so I wish you could shape and form the mask so it directly lays against your eye duct for smaller people. The one inconvenient thing is that you have to either plug it into your computer, USB plug it into the wall or get a small power bank to use it in the couch or bed. The easiest would be to get a mini power bank so it truly is portable and you can use it when reclining on a couch or in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Vizurraga

customer_reviews.title: Something....
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work well. Sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't work. Is it contact defect. But when it works, it's warm and good.
customer_reviews.author: Mirmom

customer_reviews.title: Need USB extension
customer_reviews.text: Works well... just wish it came with longer USB cord. I got an extension and it didn’t work.?!? I use it for my dry eye.. requested but eye dr.
customer_reviews.author: MissMininaz1

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my first mask about nine months ago and liked it so much I bought a second one for my vacation home. The price seemed high but from my experience with my first one, the quality justifies the price.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Good, but wide bands
customer_reviews.text: does what it promises and is really nice when it is heated. the major con and why I stopped wearing it is that the bands are wide...they don't fit behind the ear (really hurts in that position) and when I wear the bands over my ears it is uncomfortable throughout the night and I wake up without the mask on.
customer_reviews.author: vdog_2000

customer_reviews.title: Short cord/stiff mask
customer_reviews.text: The cord is too short, the mask doesn’t fit your eyes and the material isn’t flexible. I love my eye mask warmers better since the fabric is soft and fits over my eyes. The problem with the eye mask warmies is you use microwave heat and the heat dissipates too fast. Not sure what I’ll do with this mask. The short cord and stiff material is a poor design for the mask. So will I have to sleep with my laptop and my hand pressing down on the mask to make better contact on my eyes? Really?? Glad it works for others...
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Taylor Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: This works well for my tired eyes. I work night shift and have two small kids so I need to make the most of my sleep. I use this during naps and night time and my eyes just feel more relieved after. The unit can get a bit too warm so I usually use the middle setting. The mask itself is very comfortable and doesn’t smash your eyeballs.
customer_reviews.author: Candice francisco

customer_reviews.title: Love it and will update more details later
customer_reviews.text: I've used this mask for 2 nights, and I've seen the different on my face already: no dry eyes, the wrinkles are getting fading. Love it and will update more details later.
customer_reviews.author: newlife

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful eye mask
customer_reviews.text: This really does work good. It heats up good and it fits comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Love the heat!
customer_reviews.text: I love how my eyes feel following use. I select the highest heat setting and use 2 x daily. I am seeing great relief from my conic dry eye syndrome. In fact, I am using less lubricating product to keep my eyes moist since I began using the heated eye mask. I wish the mask came with a longer electrical cord. I would recommend these to anyone who suffers from chronic dry eye syndrome.
customer_reviews.author: Mary O.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry eyes. This gives me moisture back and is so relaxing to have on!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lowden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design. You get your money worth. Most importantly it doesn't emit any Electromagnetic radiation. I purchased a heating pad with seemingly same Graphene technology from another company with a disastrous EMF. This eye mask wraps up seamlessly around the head. Good light coverage. I love the evenly emitted warmth, I placed it on 2d. color. Plus it turns on right as you connect it to electricity and shuts of as promised. It's has good space for the eyes not touching them and it's soft enough not to damage the skin. I only wish it would have a silk cover and a little longer connection cord.
customer_reviews.author: Chaya Lara Vartikovskaia. Health advisor, Mentor, Emotion Healing Counseling.

customer_reviews.title: It was extremely comfortable around my eyes and the material was very flexible ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I tried out this eye mask. It was extremely comfortable around my eyes and the material was very flexible and soft around my head. Put me in a deep state of relaxation combined with the heat and infrared I was taken to another place. Felt rejuvenated afterwards. Would definitely recommend this product as it does wonders when I need to be calm and less anxious.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Irish

customer_reviews.title: Would not have paid more than $10 for it
customer_reviews.text: It’s not comfortable to use. The material is rough around your eyes, the cord gets in your way, you have to be near an outlet. Cool concept, but the design and functionality is not there yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ridge Alderete

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing and rekaxing.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful low heat eye mask. Very relaxing and soothing. Good design, keeps all light out. Light weight but to bulky to sleep in. Love this product, recommend highly. Received very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: TexasBlue

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this eye mask. I have been looking for something for a long time to help with my eyes. I have headaches that sometimes really hurts in my eyes and the mask eases the pain and relaxes me. I am also able to sleep better at night. Sometimes my eyes open in the night and dry out, but not with the mask.
customer_reviews.author: crystal west

customer_reviews.title: This works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use with wonderful health benefits from using this mask. Love the adjustable temperature and how snug mask fits around the eyes, and the velcro adjustment is good for a person with a smaller size head, and is generous for those having a larger head circumference too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hepp

customer_reviews.title: Straight up spa treatment at home
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! I originally purchased this bc I have allergy issues and needed heat on my eyes before bedtime. I put this magical contraption on my eyes and felt immediately transported to a spa. So relaxing! I’m going to purchase more for christmas presents...
customer_reviews.author: Litost x143

customer_reviews.title: I would pass.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this one. It didn’t seem to get hot enough and wasn’t very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole W

customer_reviews.title: CAUSE HEALTH ISSUES
customer_reviews.text: This eye pad caused health issues for two of my family members and they both end up spending money for medical treatment. I won't recommend to any
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing Eye Mask
customer_reviews.text: This is a very neat device for relieving itchy eyes. I came across it while browsing for a Eye Mask for my dry itchy eyes and came across this product. It's great that it does not cool down like the ones you put in the Microwave. I wish the cord was a little longer. Other than that I think I am going to be using this quite frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Horton

customer_reviews.title: Love the soothing warmth!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It gets warm but not so hot that it burns. It also blocks all the light. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Donna C

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Arrived defective, heating does not work at all. Zero heating on all modes.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin F Burris III

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The wire is very short! You have to stay put in order for these to stay plugged in. Not happy about that. I would love to return these.
customer_reviews.author: Imad

customer_reviews.title: Does not touch eyelids
customer_reviews.text: I wish the cord was longer and that the mask touched my eyelids. I wrap the mask on as tight as I can and still feel as though I have to place my hands on the mask to get the heat to my eyes. I was recently diagnosed with “extreme dry eye syndrome” and I have been searching for a heated mask. I have only used it for a few days and hope that it will give me relief!
customer_reviews.author: jmb057

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and provides dry eye relief.
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye mask that I ordered from Amazon. Not only is it very comfortable but addresses my dry eye with some relief. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Guitarman

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough
customer_reviews.text: Received this product today. Plugged it into my computer's usb, pressed the button to the highest red colored setting, put the mask on for 10 minutes, and found that it hardly produced any heat. Also, the padding around the eyes does not allow your eyelids to touch the part of the mask that generates the heat.
customer_reviews.author: J. Medina

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Does exactly what I need it to do!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I purchased it to relieve my dry eyes. It was reconnecting by my optometrist. I can definitely tell a difference. This product is so easy to use and is super relaxing. I can’t imagine starting my morning without it.
customer_reviews.author: Tess R.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work well though it took some time to ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well though it took some time to heat up. I was confused about the invitation to get an "extra" mini power bank if I reviewed the product for Amazon: there was no mini power bank in the original package. I'll use this mostly for travel when I don't have access to a microwave to heat up my other eye mask.
customer_reviews.author: RWD

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! Excelente material and fells great in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! Excelente material and fells great in my eyes. Really refreshes my eyes and made a difference! Really like it!
customer_reviews.author: IB

customer_reviews.title: Not just a gimmick
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this product, but it actually does help. I have migraines, and this can soothe them! It does help with sleep. I end up taking it off sometime during the night but I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Shante

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Warmth is great for relaxing,y boyfriend stole it we gotta buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C. Bassett

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband because he was having dry eyes. This is really helping him and he loves it. We even got a second one for my dad. It is a good product specially for people having problems with dry eyes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not hot at all
customer_reviews.text: The heat was barely past 85 degrees on the hottest setting (I checked with a thermometer). I was really hoping for the 113 degrees advertised. I must have a definitive item.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Manley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent eye mask
customer_reviews.text: Excellent eye mask! I enjoy the relaxing heating capabilities of this mask as well as how easy it is to adjust it to my liking. Quick shipping too!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Kuzmin

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs a portable charger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the reviews. I did not realize but it has to remain plugged into a USB charger to have the heat on. Consider buying a portable charger to use the mask
customer_reviews.author: Paul Zuckerman

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended. Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product. I highly recommend it. My eyes feel so relaxed. I'm glad I found this product. It does exactly what it's advertised as.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: For use with power bank ???
customer_reviews.text: This product says to plug into a Power bank but did not come with one. Can I plug it in to my USB charging tower?
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Hall

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me!
customer_reviews.text: I quite like this product. It works great for me so far and I have been sleeping much better since using it. It would be nice if it was chargeable rather than requiring a cord, and it is a little awkward for side sleeping, but I can usually settle into a comfortable position. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Température color indication
customer_reviews.text: 2: 3 temperature setting: Low setting (blue light). Medium setting (green light). High setting (Red light)
customer_reviews.author: hsinyu chao

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast but will let light through.
customer_reviews.text: Heating element works well. Runs small so if you're using it as a sleep mask it will leak light around nose area. Works great if your not using it for sleep and more to heat up muscles around eyes and sinuses.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Jengic

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Using a USB connection to power it is a great idea. The end at the mask attaches with a magnet, so if you happen to roll over or move too far from the USB socket, it will disconnect from the mask without breaking the power cord.
customer_reviews.author: JCOrange

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It helps relax my eyes quickly and allows me to fall asleep more quickly. I have tried several eye massager products before and this is by far the best. It is very light weighted so you don't feel anything if you fall asleep while wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Service!
customer_reviews.text: I actually got a broken cable when I received this product. I contacted the customer service immediately and they sent me a brand new cable. They worked perfectly fine after I plugged in and it was comfortable. Overall, it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Li

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye mask. I suffer from dry eye and the warmth of this mask and combination with the eye drops, it is a huge relief. The cord is a little too short sometimes. Overall the mask is comfortable and blocks out any light.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Eye Mask Review
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and soothing. Works better wirh a power bar since cord is short.
customer_reviews.author: 808honu

customer_reviews.title: Great Blackout Sleep Mask and great soothing warmth
customer_reviews.text: This mask is great for those who have bright rooms and need a true Blackout mask. The power heat is great, 2 temperatures.. I always have watering eyes in the morning and this helps open the pour around the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Spooky

product_meta.title: Heated Eye Mask - USB Dry Eye Mask, Electric Heating Eye Mask, Far-Infrared Therapy, Adjustable Temperature, Sleeping Heated Eye Mask, Sleep Mask to Relieve Dry Puffy Eyes
product_meta.description: Reward Your Eyes a Relaxing SPA This heating eye mask can block out day light and street light and help you relax and fall asleep quickly. The strap can be stretched easily and the temperature can be adjusted to your most comfortable level. It is super helpful to relieve the fatigue of your eyes after working in front of computer screens or driving for a long time. This sleep mask can improve your sleep quality effectively and provides you a peaceful and wonderful sleep. Your Daily Life and Travel Companion Simple design and light material makes this eye mask easy to carry so that you can enjoy an eye SPA anytime and anywhere. It can be connected to the port of computer, power bank, USB adapter, cars and so on. This eye mask would be your sleep aid during traveling and provide you high quality of relax. It is a superb travel and daily life companion. Safe Material Safe Technology This eye mask uses graphene, a high-tech new material, as its heating element. The advantages of this material are light, safe, stable performance and long service life. Wavelength of the far-infrared radiation generated by the graphene heating film is similar to the wavelength of human body. This attribute can promote blood circulation and increase cell regeneration and therefore lead to better health. In addition, this heating eye mask is set to work for one hour each time and then power off automatically. Therefore, it is safe to wear as a sleep mask. Low required voltage for working is another safety factor of this product. Key Effects of Far-infrared Physical Therapy: Vitalizes bio-molecular activation Analgesic effect Strengthens immunity function Regulates autonomic nervous system Skincare and beauty Anti-inflammatory effect
feature_bullets: 【0 PRESSURE & BLACKOUT 】– The sleep mask uses one-piece hot-pressing cutting technology, which determines a definitely lightweight eye mask. With its soft and elastic strap, it can seamlessly fit your head size for a blackout, thus enhances your sleeping quality and blood circulation around your eyes. Helping you on the problem of dry eyes.

【ADJUSTABLE POWER MODES & 3D EYE MASK】– The USB cord of this heat mask for eyes equips with a control button which allows you to adjust the heating power within 3 modes. This USB eye mask also employed the 3D contoured design which allows it to adapt your face without any discomfort.

【USB POWERED & EASY TO CARRY】- The combination of light heating material and strap makes this heating eye mask easy to carry around. Moreover, this heated eye mask is powered by any USB power source such as power bank, laptop, or USB charge unit. The eye heating pad can be used anywhere as the power sources are easy to obtain.

【1 HOUR TIMER & AUTO SHUT-OFF】 - Our eye sleeping mask would automatic shutoff after 1 HOUR work. It is worry-free for overheating on your eye when you are going to sleep. To make the warm eye mask start again, just simply press the power button.

【GRAPHENE HEATING FILM & FAR-INFRARED THERAPY】- The far-infrared wavelength emitted by the graphene heating film is very close to human body far-infrared wavelength so that this mask is perfect to provide physical therapy. This mask provides beauty and skincare therapy to smooth your wrinkles, eliminate dark circles and improves the blood circulation around your eyes.
